statements: SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity = (SELECT MAX(quantity) FROM inventory);
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity = 0
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity_available > 10 ORDER BY quantity_available DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, c.category_name FROM products p JOIN product_category pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products JOIN product_category ON products.product_id = product_category.product_id JOIN categories ON product_category.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 50;

SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM categories JOIN product_category ON categories.category_id = product_category.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE stock_level > 0;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT location_name, COUNT(*) FROM locations GROUP BY location_name;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_description, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level > 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE product_description LIKE '%clothing%' AND stock_level >= 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT location_name, quantity FROM locations l INNER JOIN inventory i ON l.location_id = i.inventory_id WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, i.quantity, l.location_name FROM products p INNER JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id INNER JOIN locations l ON i.location = l.location_name ORDER BY l.location_name, p.product_id DESC;

SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products p INNER JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT orders.order_id, products.name, orders.quantity FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.id;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT suppliers.name, suppliers.location, products.name FROM suppliers INNER JOIN products ON suppliers.id = products.id
SELECT orders.order_id, products.name, orders.quantity FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.id
SELECT inventory.product_id, inventory.in_stock, products.name FROM inventory JOIN products ON inventory.product_id = products.id
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT id, name FROM products ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE contact IS NOT NULL;
SELECT P.name, L.address FROM products P INNER JOIN locations L ON P.id = L.id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC, name
SELECT p.name, l.address FROM products p JOIN locations l ON p.id = l.id
SELECT s.name AS supplier_name, p.name AS product_name, i.quantity AS available_quantity FROM suppliers s JOIN inventory i ON s.id = i.product_id JOIN products p ON i.product_id = p.id

SELECT t.timestamp, p.name AS product_name, l.name AS location_name FROM transactions t JOIN locations l ON t.location_id = l.id JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.id WHERE t.quantity > 10 ORDER BY t.timestamp DESC
